name: AVCaptureDevice.Position
desc: Constants that indicate the physical position of a capture device.

items.name: case front
items.desc: A value that indicates a capture device is on the front side of an iOS device.

items.name: case back
items.desc: A value that indicates a capture device is on the back side of an iOS device.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: A value that indicates the capture device’s position isn’t specified.
